entry.title: Monday night: Light snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Light snow. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming south 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 16.
entry.summary: Snow. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 16. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Local blowing snow overnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming north 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 27 in the evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 02 January 2023
